entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
